featured.text: A standard of living is considered high when it includes __(31)__ necessities but also certain comforts and luxuries; it is considered low when food, clean water, housing, and __(32)__ necessities are limited or lacking.
After all, you must live within a limited budget.
The disappearance of traditional course materials. (B) The limited number of courses offered around the world.
But fresh water can be in short supply in many arid regions of the world such as Saudi Arabia, where there are limited water resources.

definition.en_def: Restricted in quantity, amount, or scope.
definition.example: The offer is limited to the first 100 customers.
